system.description:
Upon reaching 300,000 XP, a Halfling gains innate resistance to magic. They automatically take half damage from any damage-causing spell or spell-like effect (including magical items). If the effect allows a saving throw, a successful save further reduces the damage to one-quarter.

When calculating reduced damage, always round fractions down. If the final damage is Â½ a point or less, the Halfling takes 1 point of damage instead.
